author: musachy
msg: WW-2576 Add config setting packageLocatorBase, so only packages that start with that name will be scanned.
Thanks to Piero Sartini for patch

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-1099: if noop=true then idempotent should also be true, to avoid consuming the same files over and over again.
This is an empty revision for padding.

author: rpluem
msg: * Enable the use of autoconf >= 2.62 without causing APR / APR-UTIL options
passed to the configure script issue warnings about unknown options.
